post.body: Lulz... that was worth a giggle
http://twitpic.com/t53w - Beautiful darling! What's the occasion?
Gotcha beat... -31 C right now (-23 F apparently). BRRRRRR!!!!
Haha, good point.
Congrats! Where from?
<3
Me too
http://twitpic.com/t9l4 - Woot
I get to read Morrison's Beloved next term! Dedicated a year to that book- Can't wait to formally study it. Hope the prof doesn't ruin it!
http://twitpic.com/t8fc - Christmas tree cookies!! I've waited all year for these. :D
Hoo boy the roads are icy! I'm not so much driving as gliding. Oy.
Ugh I dislike post offices
I know there's tons of YouTube ukes, but where's the banjos? I like banjos!
Just discovered a treasure trove of my sister's old teaching supplies. Saving money ftw!
oh what a strange party. Dancing with my junior high principal and my high school student council supervisor...
My next term: Intro to Popular Music, American Minority Lit, Bible and Origins of the Church, and two Education courses. Should be awesome!!
Okay, Religion "BIBLE AND ORIGINS OF CHURCH" or Sociology "KNOWLEDGE AND HUMAN SOCIETY"?? I can't decide...
This is fun! I love being able to choose ANY course I want!
Found a way to get out of the class from hell!
Dec. 17: My last exam in the morning, Project for Awesome-ing in the afternoon, and reuniting with my best friend in the evening! GIANT GRIN
I think I'm going to use today to catch up on a couple weeks worth of YT videos!
At work voluntarily. Maybe I'm losing my mind?
Worst. Exam. Experience. Ever. Can't do anything but laugh now that it's over...
Exactly a year ago I was experiencing a very significant first. No regrets!
Just got my first A+!!! Woohoo!!!!!
Super relieved to know my NFI secret santa package has been delivered! Well, at least according to Canada Post.
Filmed a video intro this morning. Now off to work... but I don't wanna!!!
Slept the day away. I'm teetering on the edge of sick :(. Tomorrow: work at a new place, with new staff and new kids. But I get to see Bolt!
At Christmas number three of the day. Yay!
Catching up on everything I missed during exams - reading, blogs, emails, TV, videos, projects... why doesn't the world stop when I'm busy??
Ugh, just looked at my visa bill. Perhaps I was a little too generous this Christmas?
Long, frustrating day. Time to unwind.
http://twitpic.com/ucl5 - SANTA!
Arg! Traffic.
I need to finish my xmas shopping today. I am going to finish my xmas shopping today. Visualizing myself done my xmas shopping!
Email from my uncle in Toronto: "Hey there......how uuuuuuu doooooin ?" Gah! I can't wait to see him again!
very frustrated by my glitchy internet on P4A day. Seriously?!
DONE EXAMS!!
P4A Video is processing: http://tinyurl.com/6ra7mn
Finally! New video: http://tinyurl.com/5rdaog
